input.sentences: after i finished my shopping i got on the subway and went home .
it was a really fun ride .
after i got off i still had to walk home .
thankfully i got home just in time .
output.sentences: A woman went shopping before she headed home on the subway.
She enjoyed the ride and had fun looking out the window.
From the subway station, the woman walked home.
It was raining hard as she hurried down the street.
She had a great time but she is so thankful to be home out of the rain.
